Dragon

Vermithor - The Bronze Fury

Vermithor was a bronze dragon with "great tan wings".[3] His flames were possibly red or golden.[4][N 1] Vermithor was already a large dragon in 48 AC;[5] only Balerion and Vhagar were larger.[6] By the time of the Dance of the Dragons, Vermithor was almost a hundred years old.[1] Vermithor was a fearsome beast.[3] Accustomed to men and having had a previous rider, by the reign of Aegon II Targaryen Vermithor was tolerant of the presence of people and more accepting of new riders.[3] Vermithor often coiled with Silverwing.[1]
